snippet: In an era of over-the-top Heisman Trophy campaigns, the Aggies are taking a different approach with the freshman quarterback sensation Johnny Manziel.
abstract: Texas A&M is taking an unusually subdued approach to Heisman Trophy chatter surrounding quarterback Johnny Manziel, refusing to conduct the type of public relations campaign that has become common in recent years; Manziel is not allowed to speak with reporters and university keeps tight limits on merchandising of his name and image, complicated process in digital age.
lead_paragraph: In an era of over-the-top Heisman Trophy campaigns, the Aggies are taking a different approach with the freshman quarterback sensation Johnny Manziel.

headline.seo: Texas A&M Hushes the Heisman Hype Over Johnny Manziel
headline.main: Texas A&M Hushes the Heisman Hype Over Manziel
